statements: SELECT * FROM geospatial_data_table
SELECT id, location_name FROM geospatial_data_table WHERE id = 1
SELECT location_name, route_start, route_end FROM geospatial_data_table WHERE route_end > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM geospatial_data_table ORDER BY route_start DESC
SELECT id, location_name, ST_AsText(coordinates) AS coordinates FROM geospatial_data_table
SELECT * FROM geospatial_data_table WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location_name, route_start, route_end FROM geospatial_data_table WHERE route_start >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY route_start DESC;
SELECT id, location_name, ST_AsText(coordinates) AS coordinates_text FROM geospatial_data_table WHERE ST_Distance(coordinates, ST_GeomFromText('POINT(55.123 10.456)')) < 1000;
SELECT id, location_name FROM geospatial_data_table WHERE DATE(route_start) = '2022-09-15' AND location_name LIKE '%Airport%' ORDER BY id DESC;

SELECT location_name, ST_X(coordinates) AS longitude, ST_Y(coordinates) AS latitude FROM geospatial_data_table WHERE ST_Contains(ST_GeomFromText('POLYGON((0 0, 0 20, 20 20, 20 0, 0 0))'), coordinates);
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_name LIKE 'New%';
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT start_location_id, end_location_id, duration FROM routes WHERE duration < 60;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude >= 40 AND longitude <= -100;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE latitude > 0 AND longitude < 0 ORDER BY location_name DESC
SELECT location_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_name LIKE 'New%'
SELECT location_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE distance < 100 ORDER BY distance ASC, duration DESC
SELECT route_id, start_location_id, end_location_id, distance, duration FROM routes WHERE start_location_id = 2 OR end_location_id = 4
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT route_id, route_name, distance, start_location_id, end_location_id FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT optimization_id, route_id, completion_date, cost FROM optimizations WHERE cost < 500 ORDER BY completion_date ASC;
SELECT route_name, distance, start_location_id, end_location_id FROM routes WHERE start_location_id = 1 AND end_location_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40.0;
SELECT route_name, distance, start_location_id, end_location_id FROM routes WHERE distance < 100.00 ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM locations l JOIN routes r ON l.id = r.start_location_id WHERE r.route_name LIKE 'A%' AND l.latitude < 40.0;
SELECT o.completion_date, r.route_name, o.cost FROM optimizations o JOIN routes r ON o.route_id = r.route_id WHERE o.cost > 500.00 ORDER BY o.completion_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM geospatial_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geospatial_data WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT * FROM route_optimization WHERE distance < 100 ORDER BY route_id;
SELECT service_name AS service, description FROM location_services WHERE service_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT history_id, location_name, user_id FROM location_history WHERE time_stamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM geospatial_data WHERE latitude >= 40.00 AND longitude <= -100.00;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geospatial_data WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance FROM route_optimization WHERE distance > 100.00 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT service_name, description FROM location_services WHERE service_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT location_name, time_stamp FROM location_history WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY time_stamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM geospatial_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude FROM geospatial_data ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT place_name, category, rating FROM places WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT activity_id, activity_name, activity_type, duration_minutes FROM activities ORDER BY duration_minutes ASC;
SELECT * FROM geospatial_data WHERE id = 1
SELECT place_name, category FROM places ORDER BY category DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'j%'
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM routes WHERE distance > 50 ORDER BY distance DESC
SELECT activity_name, duration_minutes FROM activities WHERE duration_minutes < 60
